text:
ASBURV PARK, NEW JERSEY
April 12, 1950
Mr. Graydon Ausmus,
WUQA
University of Alabama
University, Alabama
Dear Mr. Ausmus:
We are pleased to enclose a copy of our
letter to Mr. Richard B. Hull, President
of the National Association of Educational
Broadcasters for your consideration and
perusal.
We would be most happy to have our distin¬
guished hotel considered for the 1951 con¬
vention, and I sincerely hope that you will
find our proposal attractive.
Anticipating the pleasure of serving you,
and with all good wishes.
Sincerely,
John Stubblefield
Assistant to the President
js/elp
Enc.
